short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A personal asset portal for the Web. Build a socially forward metaverse where assets derive value from communal activity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plato Twin is self-sovereign portal to manage digital twin in the Internet, including web accounts, digital asset and identities. Plato Twin uses blockchain as trust infrastructure, cryptographic technology and gaming theory to support Nash Market in the Metaverse of the Res Publica. Plato Twin manages all user web accounts and bridges traditional Internet applications as channels to pass personal data as digital asset.
